name: Spellsphere
description:
---Overview---


Spellsphere is a fast-paced action roguelike set in the far future where society has reverted to an era similar to the medieval ages. You play as a mage locked up in a dungeon while an evil sorcerer has taken over the island. Can you escape the dungeon, travel the island, and defeat the sorcerer?

---Gameplay---


Using two powerful magic orbs, battle your way through hordes of enemies in multiple unique zones such as a dungeon, a village, a castle, and more! Aside from combat, Spellsphere offers a unique combo-based currency to upgrade yourself in several ways.

---Variety---


Spellsphere offers various upgrades, orbs, enemies, paths to take, and rooms to battle your way through. Explore 12 different areas of the island, and fight many unique enemies. Collect over 50 different orbs to mix and match with, and get more and more powerful.

---FAQ---


Q - What kind of game is Spellsphere?
A - Spellsphere is a difficult, fast-paced, reaction-based, roguelike take on a sidescroller shoot 'em up filled with a bullet hell of enemies.

Q - When will it release?
A - Spellsphere is planned to release sometime in either late 2023 or early 2024.

Q - Is Spellsphere fun?
A - Fun is subjective, but I personally find it to be fun.

Q - What can I do after my first playthrough?
A - After the first playthrough of the game, the game is still replayable with harder difficulty and can be played a couple more times to get a true ending. After achieving the true ending, there are planned to be special features to customize any future runs.

Q - Is there a story?
A - There is a story in the game that can be learned through interacting with objects such as notes and signs, as well as NPCs.

Q - Is the game done?
A - No, the game is not completed yet. However, progress is steadily being made and you can expect updates on the release date, pricing, and more in the following months.
